item.title: RT River: $8M Strategic investment by @justinsuntron This investment supports ecosystem integration on @trondao and the deployment of Riverâ€™s chain a...
item.description:
RTâ€‚River
$8M Strategic investment by @justinsuntron

This investment supports ecosystem integration on @trondao and the deployment of Riverâ€™s chain abstraction stablecoin infrastructure.

River connects cross ecosystem assets and liquidity into TRON through satUSD, which can be minted 1 to 1 with USDT, USDD, or USD1, or backed by assets from different chains.

This enables users to access TRON native high yield opportunities directly.

satUSD will be used in stablecoin pools alongside USDT and @usddio on @OfficialSUNio. Price feeds for satUSD will be provided by
@WinkLink_Oracle. satUSD will also be available on @DeFi_JUST for lending and borrowing.

Integration expands across core assets including USDT, TRX, wBTC, BTT, JST, SUN, WIN, and NFT use cases, with native sTRX staking yield as the initial entry point.

River will launch Smart Vault and institutional grade Prime Vault to deliver yield opportunities for stablecoins, TRX, and core ecosystem assets on TRON.

This investment reinforces Riverâ€™s role as core infrastructure for the TRON, enabling liquidity, yield, and sustained on chain activity at scale.

item.title: RT Yishan: Hey all - I just signed in and claimed the funds - wanted to at least give a quick update. Gotta go to sleep for now, but tomorrow I'll be ...
item.description:
RTâ€‚Yishan
Hey all - I just signed in and claimed the funds - wanted to at least give a quick update.

Gotta go to sleep for now, but tomorrow I'll be doing my best to explain to my team (Terraformation is partially tech people, and partially not-tech people) how this all works, but it's all good news because a bunch of strangers on the internet came together to give us money to plant trees - so I expect the news will be received well. ğŸŒ³ğŸŒ³ğŸŒ³

Thank you all for this quite wonderful surprise, and we'll also be sharing updates and photos of the trees once they're in the ground. In fact, we'll have a steady stream of photos and updates for everyone: you're funding a lifetime of trees and eventually the forest they will become.

item.title: RT BONK.fun: Everyone agrees creator fees are too damn high! Today is the first step in bringing the trenches more in line. First, we are introducing ...
item.description:
RTâ€‚BONK.fun
Everyone agrees creator fees are too damn high!

Today is the first step in bringing the trenches more in line. First, we are introducing BONK Classic launches. BONK Classic launches are an opportunity to bring the trenches back to their former glory.

- NO creator fees
- 0.30% swap fees, with nearly all of the fees going towards compounding liquidity

This structure is the same as what we usually saw in 2024, when Raydium memecoins soared to billions in market cap.

item.title: A person who studied psychology and design sees user behavior differently from the pure designer. A person who learned sales and philosophy closes dea...
item.description:
A person who studied psychology and design sees user behavior differently from the pure designer. A person who learned sales and philosophy closes deals differently than the pure salesman. A person who understands fitness and business builds health companies that MBAs canâ€™t comprehend.

ä¸€å€‹ç ”ç©¶å¿ƒç†å­¸å’Œè¨­è¨ˆçš„äººçœ‹ä½¿ç”¨è€…è¡Œç‚ºä¸åŒæ–¼ç´”è¨­è¨ˆå¸«ã€‚ä¸€å€‹å­¸ç¿’éŠ·å”®å’Œå“²å­¸çš„äººé—œé–‰äº¤æ˜“ä¸åŒæ–¼ç´”éŠ·å”®å“¡ã€‚ä¸€å€‹äº†è§£å¥èº«å’Œå•†æ¥­çš„äººå»ºé€ MBAç„¡æ³•ç†è§£çš„å¥åº·å…¬å¸ã€‚

In other words, you need attention.
Attention is one of the last moats.

æ›å¥è©±èªªï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„åŠ›ã€‚
æ³¨æ„åŠ›æ˜¯æœ€å¾Œçš„è­·åŸæ²³ä¹‹ä¸€ã€‚

The creators that win right now are those without a niche they can be pinned down to. Typically, they are focused on one of the 4 eternal markets: health, wealth, relationships, happiness. Or even all of them. Technically, everyoneâ€™s niche is self-actualization, they are just all taking infinitely unique paths to get there.
They pursue your own goals (brand).
They teach what you learn (content).
They help others achieve the goal faster (product).

ç¾åœ¨çœŸæ­£æˆåŠŸçš„å‰µä½œè€…ï¼Œå¾€å¾€ä¸¦æ²’æœ‰ä¸€å€‹å›ºå®šçš„ç´°åˆ†è³½é“ã€‚

The internet is a fire hose of information.
AI is only adding more noise.
That means trust and signal are more important than ever.
In my opinion, the guiding light for your content should be to curate the best possible ideas in one place. Your brand is a collection of all the ideas you care about, in your own words, under one account on the internet.
If you have any plans to do podcasts or public speaking, notice how the best speakers always have 5-10 of their best arguments or ideas top of mind. They repeat these over and over and thatâ€™s how they build influence. If you donâ€™t have a set of those 5-10 ideas, then you wonâ€™t be as impactful as you could be. Writing a truckload of content is how you discover those ideas.
Once the â€œidea densityâ€ of your content increases with time and effort, thatâ€™s what creates a brand worth following and paying for.
The goal of curating ideas to include under your brand should fall at the intersection of:
Performance â€“ the ideas have the potential to â€œdo well.â€ This is the measure of how much other people will care.
Excitement â€“ the ideas give you a sense of excitement to write about them. This is the measure of how much you care.
